name: motion: b
description:
Click and hold to attract the ball, avoid the glitchy balls as long as you can.

Works best in Chrome, doesn't run great on mobile yet. Make sure to turn your sound up! If the sound starts glitching out, refresh the page.

motion: b was originally my entry to the Kongregate Game Jam. It received the award for Best Music as well as a runner up award for Best Graphics.

If you want to check out some of the other games made for the jam, check out this link. I recommend at least checking out Spaceman Steve in: Boxtermination and Attraction: the game.

motion: b is in development, and this page will hold the newest version.
